mapper.select: SELECT * , F_GET_ORG_PAWNS (#{orgId}) AS deal_amount FROM p_pawn_org WHERE id = #{orgId}
mapper.update: update p_pawn_org set state =#{state} where id=#{id}
update p_pawn_org set comment_count = (select count(1) from p_user_comment where status=1 and org_id = #{orgId}) where id =#{orgId}

update p_pawn_org set score = ((select sum(score) from p_user_comment where status=1 and org_id = #{orgId})/comment_count), express_score = ((select sum(express_score) from p_user_comment where status=1 and org_id = #{orgId})/comment_count), service_score = ((select sum(service_score) from p_user_comment where status=1 and org_id = #{orgId})/comment_count) where id =#{orgId} and comment_count>0
update p_pawn_org set integral = ifnull(integral,0) +#{integral} where id = #{orgId}
mapper.select: select a.*, (select count(1) from b_auth_personal where org_id = a.id) as isPersonal from p_pawn_org a where id =#{orgId}
mapper.update: update p_pawn_org set amount = (select ifnull(sum(amount_new),0) from p_org_amount_log where org_id = {orgId}) where id = #{orgId}
